nodes.name: KittyAccessControl

nodes.documentation: @dev Emited when contract is upgraded - See README.md for updgrade plan
nodes.name: ContractUpgrade

nodes.documentation: @dev Access modifier for CEO-only functionality
nodes.name: onlyCEO

nodes.documentation: @dev Access modifier for CFO-only functionality
nodes.name: onlyCFO

nodes.documentation: @dev Access modifier for COO-only functionality
nodes.name: onlyCOO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCEO The address of the new CEO
nodes.name: setCEO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCFO The address of the new CFO
nodes.name: setCFO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCOO The address of the new COO
nodes.name: setCOO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Called by any "C-level" role to pause the contract. Used only when
  a bug or exploit is detected and we need to limit damage.
nodes.name: pause
unpause
